text: (inerisu) ineziya yehat’i’atini talalek’ochina asits’eyafiwochuni yemirik’u nachewi፡፡ gini tinanishochu yemimaru nachewi፡፡ getahi mihirete sefi newina፡፡ kemidiri befet’erachihu gize inanitemi be’inatochachihu hodochi wisit’i shilochi behonachihu gize irisu benanite (huneta) ‘awak’i newi፡፡ nefisochachihunimi atawedisu irisu yemiferawini sewi ‘awak’i newi፡፡
